modName: Zaz Resources - Whips Restraints and Bondage
summary: 7 whips,  14 restraints/cages, 8 bondage positions, whipping idles
descriptionHtml:
***WARNING***

This mod contains strong sexual references, bondage & flogging animations do not download if you are sensitive to these things, download at your own discretion.

[youtube]3CNs39gBi4Y[/youtube]

[u]Description[/u]

Adds 7 whips: Crop, crop small, crop triple, birch, cane ,paddle, paddle small all craftable under iron. 14 movable restraints/cages. 8 bondage poses.

[u]Requirements[/u]

-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11811]FNIS[/url] 3.0/3.1 for skyrim 1.6, 3.2+ for 1.7+
-After Installing the ZazResources mod run \"GenerateFNISforUsers.exe\" as administrator if you have windows vista/7+ > Update FNISBehavior > consistence check  
-OPTIONAL: must have \"perfect 3-2\" [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11064]this[/url] mod for hands to line up to objects

[u]Installing/Uninstalling/Updating[/u]

-Install using NMM(recommended) or drop files into data folder
-uninstall using NMM or delete all related files
-update by uninstalling old version then install new version
 
[u]How to Use[/u]

-You should have 3 new spells: zaz spell selector, zaz npc idles & zaz player idles. Equip & cast spell selector to select which poses/objects you want. Equip & cast npc idle spell on an npc if you want an npc to be in the restraints (works on all human & beast races male & female) otherwise use player idle spell to cast on yourself.
-Objects can go through other objects so you can use the tc command to move npcs around and make the objects look like they\'re attached to walls.
-for best results use whips on followers :).

[u]Helpful Commands[/u]

Some of the commands require you to click on the npc you want to use the commands on then enter the command in the console which you open with the ~ key. Re-enter the command to undo the command. Make sure you are close enough to the npc when you click them because sometimes you might click on fog or a different npc and the command won\'t work.

tai - freezes the npc so they won\'t move around and they won\'t budge if you hit them but they cannot talk/grunt and you cannot talk to them untill you disable the command.

tdetect - stops the npc from looking at you.

tc - (must be in 3rd person view) take control of the npc so they mimic your movements. Use this command on an npc and jump to remove restraints/poses or just power attack the npc untill they stumble.

recycleactor - resets the npc to their default position and returns them to their original state.

[u]Known Issues[/u]

-npcs sometimes won\'t equip whips (to fix this remove all weapons from their inventory then re-equip whip)
-no inventory models for objects
-objects float and can\'t interact with if dropped
-the idle was left empty on purpose if actor stands like a mannequin
-the spells don\'t work on enemies

***If you know how to make restraints line up with the vanilla skeleton and want to help me out please do and I will add you in the credits.
***If you know how to fix these issues please help me out and I will credit you. Keep in mind this is my first mod.

[u]Credits[/u]

Most of the credit goes to mastercchris & xaz, I just put it all together and made an esp so the animobjects used a different spell and made the whips craftable, improved sound, removed blood and some small tweaks to make it overall better.

mastercchris - Whips, animations, whip sound, animobjects, cages, restraints, textures

xaz - bondage idles

fore - helpful tutorial and his FNIS mod.

[u]Changelog[/u]

-1.1
new whip(paddle small), 2 new objects: xcross & wooden horse, named & organized the spells better, new textures.

-1.1a
birch, cane & crop now work properly when dropped; shorter names for some spells.

[u]Mods Used In MY screenshots[/u]
*use search bar on this site

Graphics- Post Process Fxaa Injector

Faces- Coverwomen 1, Ashen Race.

Hair- apachiiskyhair, Hair packs of Fallout3, lovely hairstyles.

Body- CBBEv3 with Bodyslide, UNP BLESSED, Acdale, Athletic Muscle, CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus.
author: rofloski
